title: Mark Simonson
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131004075634/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131004075634/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Mark Simonson**

Mark Simonson (b. 1955) is an independent type designer living and working in [Saint Paul](http://web.archive.org/web/20131004075634/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Saint%20Paul), [Minnesota](http://web.archive.org/web/20131004075634/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Minnesota), USA. His fonts and other work can be seen at his website, [www.ms-studio.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131004075634/http:/www.ms-studio.com/). He also maintains a blog called Notebook at [www.marksimonson.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131004075634/http:/www.marksimonson.com/).
author: Mark Simonson
